summary: Small mod that multiply the the Alteration spells duration by Stability perk.....comes with 4 version....
descriptionHtml:
This mod multiply the duration of Alteration spells via Stability perk by 2 or 4 or 10 or 20 or 360 times!!!.....good for those who love to cast paralyze spell to see their victims suffer long enough with a grin...haha..
or cast oakflesh with effect more than 1 hour of gameplay..?

Just using a simple math calculation to create this mod.....
default duration(Paralyze):10 seconds
default perk Stability:15 seconds
AlterationPerkStability2X:20 seconds
AlterationPerkStability20X:200 seconds
AlterationPerkStability360X:3600 seconds/1 hour!!!

Make sure you already have the Stability perk in order to have this working...



Installation:
Use ONE of the esp files ONLY.Put it into your Skyrim/Data folder...simple....

In case anyone already upload this kind of mods,Im sorry because I didnt mean to copy your work.I just cant find any mods that work like this.Anyway,hope you all enjoy this.


Credit:
Creation Kit
Bethesda
Steam
author: CaezerHades
